00013 class QString;
00016 template<class function_type>
00017         class CustomFunctionBase {
00018     public:
00019         CustomFunctionBase(): handle (NULL) {}
00020         QString symbolic ();
00021         bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00022 
00023     protected:
00024         bool loadFunction (const QString &);
00025         void setValid() { valid = true; }
00026         void setInvalid() { valid = false; }
00027 
00028         function_type *func;
00029         void *handle;
00030         bool valid;
00031 };

00039         CustomFunction (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,

00042                         bool final = true);

00091 #include <dlfcn.h>
00092 
00096 template<class function_type>
00097         bool CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::loadFunction(const QString &libName) {
00098     static char *error;
00099 
00100     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00101     if (!handle) {
00102         std::cerr << "Error opening library: " << dlerror() << std::endl;
00103         return false;
00104     }
00105 
00106     func = (function_type *)dlsym(handle, "f");
00107     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00108         std::cerr << "Error finding function: " << error << std::endl;
00109         return false;
00110     }
00111 
00112     return true;
00113 }
00114 
00117 template<class function_type>
00118         QString CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::symbolic () {
00119     typedef char* STRING;
00120     STRING (*sym)();
00121     sym = (STRING (*)())dlsym(handle, "symbolic");
00122     char *error;
00123     static char *ret;
00124 
00125     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00126         std::cerr << "Error finding symbolic description in " << error << std::endl;
00127         return QString ("something");
00128     }
00129     ret=(*sym)();
00130     return QString (ret);
00131 }
